creditline: Gift of Mary Hunt Kahlenberg and Robert T. Coffland
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: strong blue boat form with geometric prows; rust, yellow and grey weaving on tan, with one green figure; geometric designs with triangle top and bottom borders and various geometric bands at ends
dimension: 23 7/8 x 84 1/8 in. (60.64 x 213.68 cm) (including heading band)
title: Ceremonial cloth (palepai)
